Founders: Duránd F. Davis Jr., Maya Elz Davis

Full Description: Labs Companies, Inc. (branded and doing business as Labs) is an American global human-enhancement technology company headquartered in Santa Monica, CA. Established in 2025 through a restructuring of LavLabs Inc., Labs now serves as the parent holding company of LavLabs, itself apart of seven core family of labs: Labs Intelligence, Labs Realities, Labs Blocks, Labs Crypto, LabsX, Factory5227 and several specialized multi-labs. Each lab is dedicated to advancing human capabilities through transformative products, services, platforms, and technologies (PSPTs) in AI, digital economies, immersive realities, consumer internet, wearables and social experiences. The Labs Manifesto: Humanizing every moment on the internet. Our name “Labs” celebrates the field of Chemistry, and our test-tube emblem, Chemí (/kim-me/), reflects our commitment to innovation. At Labs, our mission is to inspire creativity with innovative-ideas that help build communities and advance human capabilities. We believe that every human on the planet could thrive greatly with equal access and opportunity to technology. Through our flagship, franchise, framework and fandom, family of brands, we create transformative human-experiences that connect humanity through creativity, community, and innovation. Our ecosystems and economies spans across a core and specialized family of labs, including Labs Financial Group (managing Labs Payments, Yuhmmy Wallet and financial solutions within the FinTaste ecosystem), Labs Investor Group (managing early-stage, growth-stage, CVC, fund-of-funds, hedge fund, mutual fund, ETF, index fund and pension fund investments through Labs Ventures, Labs Capital, Labs Investments, Labs Funds, Labs Equity and Labs Shares), Labs Realty Group (managing YuhmmyHouse, a Social-Taste Super Club and the Tastespitality Ecosystem), Labs Start Studios (Hatch Studio, Launch Studio, and Lift Studio for entrepreneurial enhancements), Labs Learn Studios (Labs University, Labs Academy, and Labs Institute for educational enhancements), Labs Entertainment (managing Yuhmmyevents and its annual Yuhmmylicious Week and CraveCon), Labs Media (managing the official podcast by Labs: TechTubeTalks, and Yuhmmy: TastefulTalks). Our inaugural family of brand is Yuhmmy, the world’s first Social-Taste Super Brand and ecosystem designed for discovering, experiencing, and sharing anything tasty. Its Yuhmmy App brings people together to explore food, drinks, sweets, snacks, and recreational flavors in fun, funny, and flavorfully engaging ways. Featuring innovative tools like Tastechat, Taste Sports, Taste Drops, Cravecash, YuhmmyAI, and Yuhmmy AR/VR, Yuhmmy empowers a revolutionary “Tasteconomy” driven by Taste Intelligence. Labs is committed to reshaping the future of human-enhancements, seamlessly merging digital and physical worlds to redefine engagement, empowerment, education and earning. Our Labs Foundations supports sustainability, S.T.E.A.M. education, and scholarships for underserved communities through 5227.org and Lifthumankind.org, committing 1% of proceeds and resources via pledge 1%.

Full Description: Headstaart is a next-generation, AI-powered SaaS platform revolutionizing startup fundraising and business acquisition through intelligent matchmaking, automation, and verified infrastructure. Operating at the intersection of VentureTech, DealFlow Automation, and LegalTech, Headstaart unites student founders, entrepreneurs, investors, and business agents in a single streamlined ecosystem built for outcomes—not noise. Entrepreneurs can generate investor-grade pitch decks in minutes using AI, list their ventures for equity sale or full acquisition, and access ready-to-use legal documentation. Verified investors leverage advanced filters—such as geography, founder type, or industry—and gain trust signals through fund verification. Business agents access a robust dashboard with lead insights, deal flow visibility, and monetization tools, including platform-verified credentials and commission-based opportunities. Built on principles of Account-Based Matching, Startup Infrastructure SaaS, and Business Brokerage-as-a-Service, Headstaart replaces fragmented outreach with structured, AI-enhanced workflows for faster, smarter, and compliant transactions. Positioned as the Zillow for startups, Headstaart isn’t just eliminating friction—it’s systematizing how early-stage ventures get discovered, evaluated, and funded.

Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Health Care, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: AI is transforming healthcare, but the biggest bottleneck remains—annotating medical images with speed, accuracy, and scale. Frekil eliminates this roadblock. Frekil helps healthcare AI teams, medical device companies, and pharmaceutical companies annotate medical images like X-rays, CTs, MRIs, etc., efficiently for AI training, clinical trials, and FDA approvals. Our AI-assisted platform speeds up annotation 5x while maintaining high accuracy through real-time quality control, consensus checks, and advanced 3D visualization. We also provide tools to track annotator performance, build custom workflows, and increase labeling accuracy. By combining efficiency with precision, Frekil enables teams to build high-quality datasets much faster, supporting the development and deployment of reliable medical AI and clinical research solutions.

Description: Dipp AI is the research and product company building the orchestration layer for superintelligent multi-agent enterprise systems.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Biotechnology, Data and Analytics, Financial Services, Health Care, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: Dipp AI is the research and product company building the orchestration layer for superintelligent multi-agent enterprise systems. Current AI tools like chatbots and copilots operate in silos, lack coordination, and offer little to no real-time oversight — making them fundamentally unfit for the complex, high-stakes, role-based workflows in regulated industries like healthcare, finance, insurance, and government. This results in inefficiencies, risks, and a failure to scale AI beyond narrow, single-point tasks. Dipp AI is building the human-AI interaction platform for orchestrating superintelligent multi-agent systems across complex mission-critical enterprise workflows in industries like healthcare, insurance, finance and government. More specifically, we’re building a platform with three core components: Agent Mesh Orchestration Engine A coordination layer that enables multiple AI agents—each with specific roles, permissions, and specializations—to collaborate on complex tasks. These agents can reason, delegate, and escalate across systems, breaking beyond the limits of single-agent copilots. Role-Based Directive Interface A structured UI and API layer that allows human experts in any function—clinical, financial, operational—to issue directives to the agent mesh in natural or formal language. This supports dynamic collaboration, not just static task automation. Real-Time Oversight and Governance Layer A virtualization and feedback interface that lets humans supervise, intervene, and audit agent decisions in real time. This layer enforces accountability, traceability, and compliance—critical for regulated industries. Together, these components form a unified platform for deploying safe, scalable, and auditable AI systems in domains where workflows are too complex and sensitive for copilots alone.

Description: Nexia Capital builds AI-driven software solutions. Focused on IA, expanding to new sectors with a team of 14+ experts.
Founders: ANAHI CERRANO, Diego Diaz, Gaston Cumoll, Santiago DIaz
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: Nexia Capital is an AI engineering company dedicated exclusively to building intelligent agents. Our core mission is to design and deploy autonomous AI systems that solve high-value problems across industries. Our first real-world application is already live: a market intelligence agent that analyzes the Argentine financial market in real time. This agent powers a subscription-based service with over 100 active users and several institutional clients, delivering up-to-the-minute insights and reports tailored to local market dynamics. We are a growing team of 14+ experts, primarily composed of AI engineers and finance specialists, complemented by professionals in graphic design and human resources. This multidisciplinary structure allows us to build AI solutions that are not only technically robust, but also user-friendly and scalable. While our initial focus is in FinTech, our vision extends beyond finance. As the company grows, we are fully committed to dedicating all of our engineering capacity to developing AI-driven agents, expanding into new sectors and unlocking transformative use cases through applied artificial intelligence. Our first real-world application is already live: a market intelligence agent that analyzes the Argentine financial market in real time. This agent powers a subscription-based service with over 100 active users and several institutional clients, delivering up-to-the-minute insights and reports tailored to local market dynamics. While our initial focus is in FinTech, our vision extends beyond finance. As the company grows, we are committed to dedicating all of our engineering efforts to the development of AI-driven agents, expanding into new sectors and unlocking transformative use cases through applied artificial intelligence. At Nexia Capital, we’re not just building technology — we’re shaping the future of specialized, market-driven AI solutions. By leveraging the latest technologies and low-code platforms, we avoid reinventing the wheel and instead focus on building powerful solutions on top of existing tools to address challenges that current technologies can’t yet solve. We are currently open to selling up to 10% of the company in exchange for $2 million in funding. The capital will be used to acquire equipment and expand our operations beyond the financial sector. We are seeking one or more strategic investors who can not only support this round of financing but also contribute with connections, strategic input, and a collaborative role in shaping our growth plans and decision-making processes.

Description: Autosana offers an AI-powered mobile app quality assurance platform that automates end-to-end testing using natural language instructions.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: Autosana offers an AI-powered mobile app quality assurance platform that automates end-to-end testing using natural language instructions. Teams can describe test scenarios without writing code, and Autosana generates and runs the tests across iOS and Android environments. The tool integrates with CI/CD pipelines, adapts to interface changes through self-healing tests, and provides session replays for visual verification and debugging. Description: Scam AI offers a real-time API that detects whether images are AI-generated or authentic.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Content and Publishing, Data and Analytics, Media and Entertainment, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: Scam AI is a platform that provides real-time detection of AI-generated content, including deepfakes, voice clones, and synthetic images. It offers an API-based solution that integrates into applications to analyze media files for authenticity. The system employs machine learning models trained on extensive datasets to identify digital patterns and artifacts characteristic of AI-generated media. The platform supports various image formats, such as JPEG and PNG, and is optimized for photographs and realistic renderings. It delivers analysis results with an average response time of under six seconds for standard images. It also provides client libraries for multiple programming languages, facilitating integration into existing systems.

Description: NxtOF is a web3 company that uses blockchain technology to manage digital identities, assets, and interactions.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Data and Analytics, Other, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: Nxtof is a pioneering Web3 company at the forefront of decentralized identity and digital ownership solutions. Leveraging blockchain technology, we empower individuals and enterprises to securely manage their digital identities, assets, and interactions without relying on centralized authorities. Our platform is designed to redefine trust and autonomy in the digital ecosystem. Problem & Solution Problem: Centralized control over digital identities and assets exposes users to security breaches, privacy violations, and limited ownership. Solution: Nxtof offers decentralized identity management tools, enabling users to own, control, and port their digital identities across platforms securely. Our blockchain-based solutions ensure transparency, interoperability, and user sovereignty. Founded in 2025 by a team of blockchain innovators and cybersecurity experts, Nxtof emerged from a shared vision to combat centralized data exploitation. The founders recognized the urgent need for user-centric digital infrastructure in an increasingly interconnected world, leading to the creation of a platform that prioritizes privacy and empowerment.

Full Description: We are an AI infrastructure company focused on LatAm, with 3 main pillars:  1. Model serving infrastructure built on top of cloud providers 2. We are the same team that trained Tango-70b, the first 70b model from LatAm (https://tangoia.com/), and that started the open source AI R&D community SandboxAI (https://sandbox-labs.ai/) We also contribute to LatAm's AI community by providing opensource models, datasets and benchmarks, together with open documentation on how to build these.

Description: iMogul AI is an entertainment-tech platform using AI to analyze scripts, suggest casting, and engage audiences for feedback.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Media and Entertainment, Software
Full Description: iMogul AI is a next-generation entertainment-tech platform that bridges the gap between screenwriters, producers, talent agents, and audiences through AI-powered screenplay analysis, casting intelligence, and data-driven market validation. By integrating advanced GPT models, audience engagement tools, and production optimization algorithms, iMogul AI empowers studios and agencies to identify promising scripts, streamline development, and reduce creative risk. The platform offers unique features such as script clustering for parallel production opportunities, talent casting suggestions with verified IMDb data, and a gamified audience feedback engine to crowdsource opinions on casting and concept viability. iMogul AI also supports micro-compensation for engagement, enabling a transparent, incentivized feedback loop between content creators and their supporters. With a secure, scalable infrastructure and native iOS interface, iMogul AI is positioned as the go-to decision engine for the future of intelligent content development.
